name: @monaco-protocol/client-account-types
description: Client types package for the Monaco Protocol accounts
author: Monaco Protocol

scripts.publishClient: npm install && npm run build && npm publish --access public && npm run clean
scripts.publishDevClient: npm install && npm run build && npm publish --tag dev --access public && npm run clean
scripts.publishRCClient: npm install && npm run build && npm publish --tag rc --access public && npm run clean
